your_name_tip: Your name (will appear in various places)
your_number_tip: Your number (will appear in various places)
your_color_tip: Red, Blue, #FF233E49 (default - will appear in various places)
ui_color_tip: Main color style for the dash 1: Blue, 2: Black, 3: Subtle (with less backgrounds)
spotter_tip: Turn the spotter and radar surrounding the middle section 0: Off, 1: Front and Rear, 2: Rear Only
mfd_map_tip: Disable map in main dash MFDs Note: It is confirmed that maps slow down the performance on AC. If you race in AC, it is recommended to turn map off at least on main screen. 1: Show maps, 0: Hide maps
show_leds_tip: 1: Show shift / REV LEDS on main screen, 0:Hide
pedals_tip: 1: Default, Middle, 2: Linear below middle, 0: Off
turbo_tip: Show turbo boost gauge below middle area 1:Show, 0:Hide
mfd_left_tip: What to display on main screen left side by default (order could change per game, due to some screens unavailability): 0: Tyres, 1: Vehicle and Damage, 2:Timings, 3: Timings and Behind, 4: Behind, 5: Relative, 6: Class, 7:Map
mfd_right_tip: What to display on main screen right side by default: (order could change per game, due to some screens unavailability)0: Tyres, 1: Vehicle and Damage, 2:Timings, 3: Timings and Ahead, 4: Ahead, 5: Relative, 6: Class, 7:Map
pit_distance_tip: Auto display pit distance helpers in place of spotters 1: Yes, 0: No
show_alerts_mainscreen_tip: Display alerts (car settings etc) on main dash screen. 1: Pop-up alerts 0: No
show_flags_mainscreen_tip: Display flags on main dash screen. 1: Small 2: Pop-up flags 0: No
Display lap review on main dash screen 1: Pop-up 0: No
show_alerts_secondaryscreen_tip: Display alerts (car settings etc) on secondary dash screens. 1: Pop-up alerts 0: No
show_flags_secondaryscreen_tip: Display flags on secondary dash screens. 1: Small 2: Pop-up 0: No
show_speed_secondaryscreen_tip: Display speed and gear instead of car logos on secondary dash screens. 1: Yes 0: No
show_lapreview_secondaryscreen_tip: Display lap review popups on secondary dash screens  1: Pop-up 0: No
contextual_pit_tip: Auto display pit MFD with tyres and fuel once you reach the pit entry in main MFD. 1: Yes, 0: No
contextual_spin_tip: Auto display a small map if you lose control so that you can rejoin safer in main MFD. 1: Yes, 0: No
contextual_damage_tip: Auto display a damage overlay in main MFD if your car receives damage. 1: Yes, 0: No
contextual_vehicle_tip: Auto display your vehicle status in main MFD in case there is something wrong with your engine. 1: Yes, 0: No
contextual_head2head_tip: Auto display behind and ahead drivers in main MFD once the gap is within threshold. 1: Yes, 0: No
contextual_head2head_threshold_tip: The gap threshold (in seconds) for displaying behind and ahead drivers MFD. 10: 10 Seconds
laptimer_size_tip: Extra large or normal text size for first screen of laptimer 1: Normal, 2: Xlarge
laptimer_blinkonnewlap_tip: Show the last lap time as blinking in place of the current lap time when you go into a new lap 1:Yes 2:No
mfd_laptimer_tip: What to display on laptimer by default: 0: Timings, 1: Timings and Delta, 2: Behind and Ahead, 3: Tyres and Vehicle, 4:Vehicle 5: Map, 6: Relative and Map, 7: Class and Map, 8: Relative, 9: Class
mfd_radar_tip: What to display on radar by default:  0: Radar, 1: Behind and Ahead, 2: Timings with Behind and Ahead, 3: Timings, 4: Timings with Delta, 5: Map, 6: Tyres, 7: Vehicle, 8: Relative, 9: Class
show_position_radar_tip: 1: Show position and lap on top, 0: hide
show_alerts_laptimer_tip: 1: Show car adjustment alerts, 2: Fullscreen alerts 0: hide
show_flags_laptimer_tip: 1: Show flags in radar, 2: Fullscreen flags 0: hide
ams_brakedamageontyres_tip: Show brake damage gauge combined with the temperature on tyres widget. 1:Show 2:Hide
radar_background_tip: 1: Normal, 2: Green for chroma-keying with OBS
